qas.question: About how many people in Somalia speak Somali?
In millions, about how many global Somali speakers are there?
Along with Greater Somalia ethnic Somalis, who speaks Somali?

context: The exact number of speakers of Somali is unknown. One source estimates that there are <a0_0>7.78 million<a0_0/> speakers of Somali in Somalia itself and <a1_0>12.65<a1_0/> million speakers globally. The Somali language is spoken by ethnic Somalis in Greater Somalia and <a2_0>the Somali diaspora<a2_0/>.
